name: Cat Noir
description:
A 2D local multiplayer game for PC and Mac built in Unity. Made in 2 months as part of a student project at New York Film Academy. Designed for two players, one person playing three mice and the other playing as a slower cat. Heavily inspired by film noir, detectives and mobsters! It's pretty swell, I think.

Instructions are in-game.

Windows build controls using a keyboard and a mouse.

Mac build controls using playstation controllers.

This is a two-player game.
